org.agreement_technologies.common.map_landmarks

Interface LandmarkNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LGNode

    public interface LandmarkNode
    LandmarkNode interface provides the necessary methods to work with nodes in the landmarks graph (LG).
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DISJUNCTION 
      static boolean SINGLE_LITERAL 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAgents()
      Gets agents that share the landmark node.
      LandmarkSet getDisjunction()
      Returns the disjunction of a disjunctive landmark node.
      int getGlobalId()
      Gets the unique global (multi-agent) identifier of the landmark node.
      int getIndex()
      Gets local index of the landmark node.
      LandmarkFluent getLiteral()
      Gets the literal associated to the single landmark node.
      LandmarkFluent[] getLiterals()
      Gets the list of literals associated to the disjunctive landmark node.
      java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkAction> getProducers()
      Gets list of actions that produce the literal or literals of the landmark node as effects.
      java.lang.String identify()
      Gets landmark node metadata.
      boolean isGoal()
      Checks if the landmark node is a goal.
      boolean isSingleLiteral()
      Checks if the landmark node is single or disjunctive.

      Assigns list of agents that share the landmark node.
      void setAntecessors(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> antecessors)
      Establishes predecessor landmark nodes in the LG.
      int setGlobalId(int globalIndex)
      Sets a unique global (multi-agent) identifier for the landmark node.
      void setIndex(int index)
      Establishes local index of the landmark node.

    • Method Detail

      • getLiterals

        LandmarkFluent[] getLiterals()
        Gets the list of literals associated to the disjunctive landmark node.
        Returns:
        List of literals, null if the landmark is SINGLE_LITERAL
        Since:
        1.0

      • isGoal

        boolean isGoal()
        Checks if the landmark node is a goal.
        Returns:
        true, if the landmark is a goal; false, otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • isSingleLiteral

        boolean isSingleLiteral()
        Checks if the landmark node is single or disjunctive.
        Returns:
        SINGLE_LITERAL if the landmark is single, DISJUNCTION if the landmark is disjunctive
        Since:
        1.0

      • getLiteral

        LandmarkFluent getLiteral()
        Gets the literal associated to the single landmark node.
        Returns:
        Literal of the node, null if the landmark is DISJUNCTION
        Since:
        1.0

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Gets local index of the landmark node.
        Returns:
        Landmark index
        Since:
        1.0

        index - Landmark index
        Since:
        1.0

        java.lang.String identify()
        Gets landmark node metadata.
        Returns:
        String of landmark node data

      • setAntecessors

        void setAntecessors(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> antecessors)
        Establishes predecessor landmark nodes in the LG.
        Parameters:
        antecessors - Local indexes of landmark nodes that precede this landmark node
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDisjunction

        LandmarkSet getDisjunction()
        Returns the disjunction of a disjunctive landmark node.
        Returns:
        Disjunction of the landmark node, null if SINGLE_LITERAL
        Since:
        1.0

      • getProducers

        java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkAction> getProducers()
        Gets list of actions that produce the literal or literals of the landmark node as effects.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of producer landmark actions
        Since:
        1.0

      • setGlobalId

        int setGlobalId(int globalIndex)
        Sets a unique global (multi-agent) identifier for the landmark node.
        Parameters:
        globalIndex - Global identifier
        Returns:
        Next global identifier
        Since:
